title: Flexport | SDE - 1 | Bangalore (Hybrid)
content:
Education: B.Tech from tier 3 college (2023 passout)
Years of Experience: 1+ year
Date of the Offer: 28th October, 2024
Company: Flexport
Title/Level: Software Development Engineer 1 
Location: Bangalore (Hybrid)
Salary: INR 27 lpa
Signing Bonus: INR 2 lpa
Stock bonus: 12000 units of stocks (currently each unit cost $3.15) => 12000 * 3.15 * 83 = 31.3 lacks, vested equally for 4 years.
Bonus: Performance- 10 % of base pay => 2.7 lpa
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~63 lpa
1st year Compensation ~ 40 lpa

title: Mr. Cooper | Software Engineer 1 | Chennai
content:
Education: B.Tech. CSE (Tier 1-2)
Years of Experience: 0
Prior Experience: 0
Type of Offer: 6 months internship + FTE (intern stipend: 25k)
Date of the Offer: 2023
Company: Mr. Cooper
Title/Level: Software Engineer Trainee (Entry Level)
Location: Chennai
Salary: 7.5 lakhs CTC
Retention Bonus: 1 lakh after 1st year and 1.5 lakhs after 2nd year
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 10 L
Benefits: Work from home, Medical insurance, Life insurance, etc...
Other details: Great place to work certified with good work culture.
